The residential landscape here features diverse options, from premium builder floors and spacious independent villas to plotted developments where you can construct your dream home. Our curated listings provide verified properties, transparent pricing, and comprehensive market insights, ensuring your decision to buy house in Sector 106 is informed, secure, and perfectly matched to your lifestyle goals. Explore the possibilities of high-end living supported by world-class social and retail infrastructure.

featuresSection.heading: Discover Ideal Home Configurations When You Decide to Buy House in Sector 106 Gurugram
description: Sector 106 offers a spectrum of residential solutions tailored for discerning homeowners. Whether you seek compact luxury or expansive living spaces, the variety of properties available ensures every requirement is met. We focus on properties that deliver superior architectural design, modern amenities, and robust construction quality, making your house purchase a lasting asset.

Understanding the standard plot sizes helps in visualizing the scope of your future home. From efficient layouts ideal for nuclear families to sprawling plots perfect for multi-generational houses, these features highlight the potential scale and design freedom available in this prestigious sector of Gurugram.

features.title: 4 Marla Plot for Efficient Homes
features.description: These smaller plots are highly sought after for constructing compact yet sophisticated builder floors or independent homes typically featuring 2BHK or small 3BHK configurations. They offer excellent entry points for individuals looking to buy house in Sector 106 without compromising on location quality or essential amenities. Ideal for professionals or small families seeking low-maintenance living with high returns potential.

features.title: 6 Marla Plot for Mid-Size Family Houses
features.description: A 6 Marla plot provides the perfect balance between manageable size and spacious living. This size comfortably accommodates a modern 3BHK or a well-designed 4BHK house, often including dedicated parking and a small landscaped area. Buying a house on this size plot in Sector 106 ensures ample room for growth and personalization in a rapidly appreciating neighborhood.

features.title: 8 Marla Plot for Spacious Independent Villas
features.description: The 8 Marla plot is popular among those desiring larger independent villas or duplex houses. These dimensions allow for expansive floor plans, dedicated servant quarters, and luxury features such as private terraces or home offices. Investing in a house built on an 8 Marla plot in Sector 106 Gurugram signifies commitment to luxury and substantial space.

features.title: 10 Marla Plot for Premium Residential Construction
features.description: Plots of 10 Marla and above are generally reserved for custom-built luxury residences. This size permits architectural creativity, allowing for double-height living areas, home theaters, and elaborate landscaping. When you buy house constructed on a 10 Marla plot in Sector 106, you are securing a statement property designed for elite living and long-term value appreciation.

features.title: 12 Marla Plot for Bespoke Luxury Homes
features.description: A 12 Marla plot offers substantial construction area, enabling the development of magnificent residences with multiple levels and dedicated recreational spaces. This size is perfect for families requiring multiple master bedrooms and extensive outdoor space, providing unparalleled exclusivity and privacy within Sector 106 Gurugram.

features.title: 14 Marla Plot for Elite Architectural Masterpieces
features.description: The largest available plots, 14 Marla and above, cater to the ultra-luxury segment. These plots are suitable for grand estates or mansions designed with the highest standards of materials and technology. Owning a house on a 14 Marla plot means securing one of the most prestigious addresses and maximizing your investment potential in Sector 106.

faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions About How to Buy House in Sector 106 Gurugram
faqSection.description: We address common concerns regarding investment, documentation, and lifestyle aspects of purchasing residential property in this prime Gurugram sector.

faqs.question: What types of houses are typically available for sale in Sector 106 Gurugram
faqs.answer: Sector 106 offers a broad range of housing options catering to different budget segments and lifestyle needs. You can find ready-to-move-in independent houses, luxurious builder floors in low-rise developments, and custom-built villas on individual plots. The configurations range mostly from spacious 3BHK units to expansive 5BHK houses, all designed to meet contemporary urban living standards. We highly recommend reviewing listings from trusted builders for verified quality and necessary approvals.

faqs.question: Is Sector 106 a good investment location considering the current property rates
faqs.answer: Yes Sector 106 is widely considered a premium investment location due to its strategic position on the Dwarka Expressway. Property rates here show strong growth trajectory primarily driven by improved connectivity to Delhi and the saturation of core Gurugram areas. Infrastructure projects nearing completion are expected to trigger the next phase of price appreciation, making the current time opportune for long-term investors or homeowners.

faqs.question: How is the connectivity of Sector 106 to the IGI Airport and Delhi NCR
faqs.answer: Connectivity is a major highlight of Sector 106. The Dwarka Expressway provides a direct and efficient link, allowing residents to reach IGI Airport Terminal 3 within a short drive, typically under 25 to 30 minutes depending on traffic. Furthermore, the expressway ensures fast travel times into key areas of New Delhi and other parts of the NCR region, significantly boosting the livability quotient.

faqs.question: Are there any necessary approvals or legal checks required before I buy house here
faqs.answer: Absolutely. Before finalizing any purchase, ensure the property has clear titles and all requisite government approvals, including the Occupation Certificate OC and Completion Certificate CC if it is a completed building. For plotted developments, confirm the license status with the respective development authority like Haryana Shehri Vikas Pradhikaran HSVP or specific developer licenses. Our legal team assists clients in verifying all documentation thoroughly.

faqs.question: What amenities can I expect when purchasing a house in Sector 106
faqs.answer: Houses and residential projects in Sector 106 are equipped with modern and upscale amenities. These commonly include 24/7 security surveillance, power backup facilities, dedicated parking spaces, piped gas connection availability, and access to nearby clubhouses and recreational facilities. The emphasis is on providing a safe, comfortable, and luxurious residential experience.

faqs.question: What is the typical size range for an independent house in Sector 106 Gurugram
faqs.answer: Independent houses and villas in Sector 106 vary widely based on the specific development and plot size. Generally, the covered area for a desirable independent house starts around 1800 square feet and can exceed 4000 square feet for luxury villas. The most common plot sizes utilized for construction range from 6 Marla to 14 Marla, offering substantial space for comfortable living.

faqs.question: Are builder floors a popular housing option in Sector 106 and why
faqs.answer: Yes, high-end builder floors are exceptionally popular in Sector 106. They offer the feel of independent living with manageable costs and maintenance. Premium builder floors typically feature independent water and electricity connections, dedicated lifts, and high-quality fittings, providing excellent value for money compared to high-rise apartments or full villas.

faqs.question: How does the rental market perform for houses in Sector 106
faqs.answer: The rental market in Sector 106 is poised for strong growth, driven by the increasing influx of professionals working in nearby Gurugram and Delhi hubs. Once the Dwarka Expressway is fully integrated, rental demand for high-quality houses and builder floors is expected to increase significantly, offering attractive yields for investors who buy house and choose to rent it out.

faqs.question: Which major real estate developers have projects or plots in Sector 106
faqs.answer: Sector 106 has attracted several renowned developers recognized for their quality and timely delivery. Some of the major names active in this area include prominent real estate groups known for their plotted developments and high-end residential projects, ensuring a wide array of reliable options for potential buyers.

faqs.question: What are the hidden costs associated with buying a house in Sector 106
faqs.answer: When budgeting to buy a house, always account for additional costs beyond the base selling price. These typically include stamp duty and registration fees, property tax adjustment, maintenance security deposits, electricity and water connection charges, and potential charges for interior finishing or modifications. We provide a detailed cost sheet to ensure transparency in your purchase process.
